name: Deploy Static website to AWS on: push: branches: - main jobs: deploy: runs-on: ubuntu-latest steps: - name: Checkout repository uses: actions/checkout@v4 - name: Configure AWS credentials uses: aws-actions/configure-aws-credentials@v4 with: aws-access-key-id: ${{ secrets.AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID }} aws-secret-access-key: ${{ secrets.AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY }} aws-region: ${{ secrets.AWS_REGION }} - name: Upload files to S3 run: | # Syncs your repo files to the internstatic bucket aws s3 sync . s3://${{ secrets.S3_BUCKET_NAME }} \ --delete \ --exclude ".git/*" \ --exclude "README.md" \ --exclude ".github/*" - name: Invalidate CloudFront cache run: | # Clears the old version from CloudFront so users see the new index.html immediately aws cloudfront create-invalidation \ --distribution-id ${{ secrets.CLOUDFRONT_DISTRIBUTION_ID }} \ --paths "/*"
